name: BeSocial
0:
”Alexa, open Be Social”
”Alexa, ask Be Social to give stats of my account”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: be social
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Be Social, opening up your world of social media through Alexa.

Currently Supports:
*Facebook

Coming Soon:
*Instagram
*Twitter

Facebook
Check the live number of likes and the page description of ANY Facebook page. 
Also you can select one page to be your main account and access it very easily.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
